name: obsync
description: Obsync self-hosted realtime sync stack for Obsidian

scripts.build: npm run -w @obsync/shared build && npm run -w @obsync/server build && npm run -w @obsync/plugin build
scripts.test: npm run -w @obsync/shared test && npm run -w @obsync/server test && npm run -w @obsync/plugin test
scripts.lint: npm run -w @obsync/shared lint && npm run -w @obsync/server lint && npm run -w @obsync/plugin lint
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w @obsync/shared build && npm run -w @obsync/shared typecheck && npm run -w @obsync/server typecheck && npm run -w @obsync/plugin typecheck
